alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 29 at 1:57AM MDT until May 30 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MDT MONDAY ABOVE 7500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 7500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts, particularly in the Upper Cottonwoods. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains South of I-80, Wasatch Mountains I- 80 North and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 6 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...The snow will result in periods of travel difficulties on mountain routes across northern Utah. Use caution when traveling.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains
